languages.text: Корабли ходят в бою по очереди в зависимости от значения их очередности. Чем меньше корабль, тем выше его очередность — маленькие корабли получают ход раньше крупных. Очередность корабля Вольного Торговца ниже вражеской — обычно они ожидают вашего появления и ходят первыми. Но случаются и обратные ситуации, когда застать противника врасплох сможете уже вы.

Ships in combat act in turns based on their priority. The smaller the ship, the higher its priority — small ships get to act earlier than large ones. The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} has a lower priority than enemy ships as they tend to anticipate your arrival and therefore act first. However, the opposite can also occur if you manage to get the drop on your adversaries.
languages.original_text: Корабли ходят в бою по очереди в зависимости от значения их очередности. Чем меньше корабль, тем выше его очередность — маленькие корабли получают ход раньше крупных. Очередность корабля Вольного Торговца ниже вражеской — обычно они ожидают вашего появления и ходят первыми. Но случаются и обратные ситуации, когда застать противника врасплох сможете уже вы.

traits.locale_text: Ships in combat act in turns based on their initiative. The smaller the ship, the higher its initiative — small ships get to act earlier than large ones. The Rogue Trader's flagship has a lower initiative than enemy ships as they tend to anticipate your arrival and therefore act first. However, the opposite can also occur, if you manage to get the drop on your adversaries.

Ships in combat act in turns based on their initiative. The smaller the ship, the higher its initiative — small ships get to act earlier than large ones. The Rogue Trader's flagship has a lower initiative than enemy ships as they tend to anticipate your arrival and therefore act first. However, the opposite can also occur, if you manage to get the drop on your adversaries.

Ships in combat act in turns based on their initiative. The smaller the ship, the higher its initiative — small ships get to act earlier than large ones. The Rogue Trader's flagship has a lower initiative than enemy ships as they tend to anticipate your arrival and therefore act first. However, the opposite can also occur if you manage to get the drop on your adversaries.

Ships in combat act in turns based on their initiative. The smaller the ship, the higher its initiative — small ships get to act earlier than large ones. The Rogue Trader's flagship has a lower initiative than enemy ships as they tend to anticipate your arrival and therefore act first. However, the opposite can also occur if you manage to get the drop on your adversaries.

Ships in combat act in turns based on their priority. The smaller the ship, the higher its priority — small ships get to act earlier than large ones. The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} has a lower priority than enemy ships as they tend to anticipate your arrival and therefore act first. However, the opposite can also occur if you manage to get the drop on your adversaries.

languages.text: Im Kampf handeln Schiffe in Zügen, basierend auf ihrer Priorität. Je kleiner das Schiff, desto höher seine Priorität – kleine Schiffe können früher handeln als große. Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} des Freihändlers hat eine niedrigere Priorität als feindliche Schiffe, da diese deine Ankunft antizipieren und entsprechend zuerst handeln. Jedoch kann auch das Gegenteil eintreten, wenn du es schaffst, deine Gegner zu überrumpeln.
languages.original_text: Ships in combat act in turns based on their priority. The smaller the ship, the higher its priority — small ships get to act earlier than large ones. The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} has a lower priority than enemy ships as they tend to anticipate your arrival and therefore act first. However, the opposite can also occur if you manage to get the drop on your adversaries.

traits.locale_text: Im Kampf handeln Schiffe in {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zügen{/g}, basierend auf ihrer Initiative. Je kleiner das Schiff, desto höher seine Initiative — kleine Schiffe können früher handeln als große. Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} des Freihändlers hat eine niedrigere Initiative als feindliche Schiffe, da diese deine Ankunft antizipieren und entsprechend zuerst handeln. Jedoch kann auch das Gegenteil eintreten, wenn du es schaffst, deine Gegner zu überrumpeln.

languages.text: En situation de combat, les vaisseaux agissent à tour de rôle en fonction de leur priorité. Plus le vaisseau est petit, plus sa priorité est élevée. Les petits vaisseaux agissent plus tôt que les grands vaisseaux. Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} du libre-marchand présente une priorité inférieure à celle des vaisseaux ennemis, car ils ont tendance à anticiper votre arrivée et à agir en premier. Vous pouvez cependant inverser cette tendance si vous parvenez à surprendre vos adversaires.
languages.original_text: Ships in combat act in turns based on their priority. The smaller the ship, the higher its priority — small ships get to act earlier than large ones. The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} has a lower priority than enemy ships as they tend to anticipate your arrival and therefore act first. However, the opposite can also occur if you manage to get the drop on your adversaries.

traits.locale_text: En situation de combat, les vaisseaux agissent à {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de rôle en fonction de leur initiative. Plus le vaisseau est petit, plus son initiative est élevée. Les petits vaisseaux agissent plus tôt que les grands vaisseaux. Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} du Libre-Marchand présente une initiative inférieure à celle des vaisseaux ennemis, car ils ont tendance à anticiper votre arrivée et à agir en premier. Vous pouvez cependant inverser cette tendance si vous parvenez à prendre le dessus sur vos adversaires.

languages.text: 战舰每个回合的行动顺序取决于战舰的先攻值。舰船尺寸越小，先攻值越高。因此，小型舰船往往比大型舰船行动更早。行商浪人{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的先攻值通常比敌舰的先攻值要低，因为敌人往往早就做好了准备，等待行商浪人的到来，抢先行动。不过，如果您成功地突袭了对手，则情况会恰恰相反。
languages.original_text: Ships in combat act in turns based on their priority. The smaller the ship, the higher its priority — small ships get to act earlier than large ones. The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} has a lower priority than enemy ships as they tend to anticipate your arrival and therefore act first. However, the opposite can also occur if you manage to get the drop on your adversaries.

traits.locale_text: 战舰每个回合的行动顺序取决于战舰的先攻值。舰船尺寸越小，先攻值越高。因此，小型舰船往往比大型舰船行动更早。行商浪人{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的先攻值通常比敌舰的先攻值要低，因为敌人往往早就做好了准备，等待行商浪人的到来，抢先行动。不过，如果您成功地突袭了对手，则情况会恰恰相反。

languages.text: A la hora de combatir, las naves actúan por turnos en función de su prioridad. Cuanto más pequeña sea la nave, mayor será su prioridad; las naves pequeñas actúan antes que las más grandes. La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} de tu Comerciante Independiente tiene menos prioridad que las de los enemigos, ya que estos suelen anticipar tu llegada y por ello actúan primero. Sin embargo, puede darse lo contrario si logras sacarles ventaja a tus adversarios.
languages.original_text: Ships in combat act in turns based on their priority. The smaller the ship, the higher its priority — small ships get to act earlier than large ones. The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} has a lower priority than enemy ships as they tend to anticipate your arrival and therefore act first. However, the opposite can also occur if you manage to get the drop on your adversaries.

traits.locale_text: A la hora de combatir, las naves actúan por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g} en función de su iniciativa. Cuanto más pequeña sea la nave, mayor será su iniciativa; las naves pequeñas actúan antes que las más grandes. La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} de tu Comerciante Independiente tiene menos iniciativa que las de los enemigos, ya que estos suelen anticipar tu llegada y por ello actúan primero. Sin embargo, puede darse lo contrario si logras sacarles ventaja a tus adversarios.

languages.original_text: Ships take turns in combat depending on their initiative value. The smaller the ship, the higher its initiative — small ships get a turn before large ships. The initiative of a player's ship is lower than that of all enemies — usually they wait for it to appear and move first. However, sometimes the opposite can also happen, when the player manages to take the enemy by surprise.

languages.text: 戦闘中の船はイニシアチブに基づく順番で行動を起こす。船が小さければ小さいほど、イニシアチブは高くなる。小型船は大型船よりも早く行動できる。敵船はプレイヤーの到着を予期して先に行動に出る傾向があるので、ローグトレーダーの{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}のイニシアチブは敵のそれより低い。しかし、もし敵対者を機先を制することができれば、逆も起こり得る。
languages.original_text: Ships in combat act in turns based on their priority. The smaller the ship, the higher its priority — small ships get to act earlier than large ones. The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} has a lower priority than enemy ships as they tend to anticipate your arrival and therefore act first. However, the opposite can also occur if you manage to get the drop on your adversaries.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中の船はイニシアチブに基づく{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}順番{/g}でアクションを起こす。船が小さければ小さいほど、イニシアチブは高くなる。つまり、小型船は大型船よりも早く行動できる。敵船はプレイヤーの到着を予期して先に行動に出る傾向があるので、ローグトレーダーの{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}のイニシアチブは敵のそれよりも低い。しかし、もし敵対者を機先を制することができれば、逆も起こり得る。
